summary: A flexible Multiple Instance Learning (MIL) model for 2‑D image classification that aggregates features from multiple instances extracted from each whole‑slide image using a configurable backbone CNN and several MIL aggregation strategies (mean, max, attention, transformer‑based).
business_intent: Enable researchers and clinicians to build and deploy accurate pathology whole‑slide image classifiers by providing an out‑of‑the‑box MIL framework that can leverage pretrained CNN backbones and advanced attention/transformer mechanisms, reducing development time and improving diagnostic AI solutions.
